r.s: Communication with IBM Z/OS through IMS Connect
r.d:
Implements IMS Connect protocol to execute transactions on Mainframe platforms :
- Most connection parameters available (host, user, clientid, lterm, datastore, RACF security, ...) - Input/Output messages processed as associative arrays in PHP scripts - Data fields processed accordingly to Close Copy description (from separate XML files). - Automatic character conversion ASCII/EBCDIC - Data communication tracing (through HTML display)
Technical considerations :
- Compatibility with both PHP 4 and PHP 5 - Requires a Z/OS server with IMS Connect for testing - Supported IMS Connect Exits : o HWSJAVA0 Java module (default) o HWSIMSO0 Simple module - No documentation published yet
